</P>
<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2228030ZEX-32_1_HTM_KQ77201_EXHIBIT_32_1">
</A>
<A NAME="A2228030ZEX-32_1_HTM_TOC_KQ77201_1">
</A>
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	EXHIBIT 32.1
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2228030ZEX-32_1_HTM_KQ77201_CERTIFICATION">
</A>
<A NAME="A2228030ZEX-32_1_HTM_TOC_KQ77201_2">
</A>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, Frederic F.
	Brace, Interim President and Chief Executive Officer of Midstates Petroleum Company,&nbsp;Inc. (the "Company"), certifies that, to his knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	1.
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the
	Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K of the Company for the period ending December&nbsp;31, 2015, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on
	the date hereof (the "Report"), fully complies with the requirements of section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	2.
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the
	information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2228030ZEX-32_2_HTM_KS77201_CERTIFICATION">

</A>

<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, Nelson M.
	Haight, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Midstates Petroleum Company,&nbsp;Inc. (the "Company"), certifies that, to his knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	1.
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the
	Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K of the Company for the period ending December&nbsp;31, 2015, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on
	the date hereof (the "Report"), fully complies with the requirements of section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	2.
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the
	information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>

It is our understanding that the proved reserves estimated in this report constitute 100% of all proved reserved owned by Midstates Petroleum Company,&nbsp;Inc. <A NAME="eolPage12"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<I>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Midstates Petroleum Company,&nbsp;Inc. Interests
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	As of January&nbsp;1, 2016
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page&nbsp;2 of 2
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 5.75PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	As requested, hydrocarbon pricing of $50.28 per barrel of oil/condensate (WTI Cushing) and
</FONT>
</FONT>
	$2.587 per MMBtu of gas (Henry Hub) was applied without escalation.&#160;&#160; In accordance with the Securities and Exchange Commission guidelines, these prices were determined as an unweighted arithmetic average of the first-day-of-the-month price for the previous 12 months.&#160; NGL prices were forecast as fraction of the above oil prices.&#160; Basis differentials were applied to the oil and gas prices, and deductions were applied to the net gas volumes for fuel and shrinkage.&#160; The adjusted volume- weighted average product prices over the life of the properties are $46.86 per barrel of oil, $2.37 per Mcf of gas and $17.27 per barrel of NGL.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 5.75PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Operating&#160; expenses&#160; were&#160; based&#160; on&#160; operating&#160; expense&#160; records&#160; of&#160; Midstates&#160; Petroleum Company,&nbsp;Inc.&#160;&#160; Drilling and completion costs were based on estimates provided by Midstates Petroleum Company,&nbsp;Inc. and reviewed by Cawley, Gillespie&nbsp;&amp; Associates.&#160; Severance tax and ad valorem rates were specified by state/county based on actual rates.&#160; Plugging and abandonment costs of $36,000 to $48,000 (net of salvage value) were applied to all wells.&#160;&#160; Neither expenses nor investments were escalated.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 6.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The&#160; proved&#160; reserve&#160; classifications&#160; conform&#160; to&#160; criteria&#160; of&#160; the&#160; Securities&#160; and&#160; Exchange Commission.&#160;&#160; The reserves were estimated using a combination of the production performance, volumetric and analogy methods, in each case as we considered to be appropriate and necessary to establish&#160; the conclusions&#160; set&#160; forth&#160; herein.&#160;&#160;&#160; The reserves and economics are predicated on the regulatory agency classifications, rules, policies, laws, taxes and royalties in effect on the effective date except as noted herein.&#160; The possible effects of changes in legislation or other Federal or State restrictive actions have not been considered. All reserve estimates represent our best judgment based on data available at the time of preparation and assumptions as to future economic and regulatory conditions.&#160; It should be realized that the reserves actually recovered, the revenue derived therefrom and the actual cost incurred could be more or less than the estimated amounts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 6.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The reserve estimates were based on interpretations of factual data furnished by Midstates Petroleum Company,&nbsp;Inc.&#160; Ownership interests were supplied by Midstates Petroleum Company,&nbsp;Inc. and were accepted as furnished.&#160; To some extent, information from public records has been used to check and/or supplement these data. The basic engineering and geological data were utilized subject to third party reservations and qualifications.&#160;&#160; Nothing has come to our attention, however, that would cause us to believe that we are not justified in relying on such data.&#160; An on-site inspection of these properties has not been made nor have the wells been tested by Cawley, Gillespie&nbsp;&amp; Associates,&nbsp;Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 6.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 6.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our work-papers and related data are available for inspection and review by authorized parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 226.55PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
